verses.verse: לְֽ֭תַאֲוָה <S%H8378><s%> Through desire יְבַקֵּ֣שׁ <S%H1245><s%> himself seeketh נִפְרָ֑ד <S%H6504><s%> a man having separated בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all תּ֝וּשִׁיָּ֗ה <S%H8454><s%> with all wisdom יִתְגַּלָּֽע׃ <S%H1566><s%> [and] intermeddleth

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יַחְפֹּ֣ץ <S%H2654><s%> hath no delight כְּ֭סִיל <S%H3684><s%> A fool בִּתְבוּנָ֑ה <S%H8394><s%> in understanding כִּ֝֗י <S%H3588><s%> But אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> only בְּהִתְגַּלּ֥וֹת <S%H1540><s%> may discover לִבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H3820><s%> but that his heart

בְּֽבוֹא־ <S%H935><s%> cometh רָ֭שָׁע <S%H7563><s%> When the wicked בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> [then] cometh גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also בּ֑וּז <S%H937><s%> also contempt וְֽעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> and with קָל֥וֹן <S%H7036><s%> and with ignominy חֶרְפָּֽה׃ <S%H2781><s%> reproach

מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters עֲ֭מֻקִּים <S%H6013><s%> [are as] deep דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> The words פִי־ <S%H6310><s%> mouth אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of a man's נַ֥חַל <S%H5158><s%> brook נֹ֝בֵ֗עַ <S%H5042><s%> [as] a flowing מְק֣וֹר <S%H4726><s%> [and] the wellspring חָכְמָֽה׃ <S%H2451><s%> of wisdom

שְׂאֵ֣ת <S%H5375><s%> to accept פְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> the person רָשָׁ֣ע <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [It is] not good לְהַטּ֥וֹת <S%H5186><s%> to overthrow צַ֝דִּ֗יק <S%H6662><s%> the righteous בַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> in judgment

שִׂפְתֵ֣י <S%H8193><s%> lips כְ֭סִיל <S%H3684><s%> A fool's יָבֹ֣אֽוּ <S%H935><s%> enter בְרִ֑יב <S%H7379><s%> into contention וּ֝פִ֗יו <S%H6310><s%> and his mouth לְֽמַהֲלֻמ֥וֹת <S%H4112><s%> for strokes יִקְרָֽא׃ <S%H7121><s%> calleth

פִּֽי־ <S%H6310><s%> mouth כְ֭סִיל <S%H3684><s%> A fool's מְחִתָּה־ <S%H4288><s%> [is] his destruction ל֑וֹ וּ֝שְׂפָתָ֗יו <S%H8193><s%> and his lips מוֹקֵ֥שׁ <S%H4170><s%> [are] the snare נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H5315><s%> of his soul

דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> The words נִ֭רְגָּן <S%H5372><s%> of a talebearer כְּמִֽתְלַהֲמִ֑ים <S%H3859><s%> [are] as wounds וְ֝הֵ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> and they יָרְד֥וּ <S%H3381><s%> and they go down חַדְרֵי־ <S%H2315><s%> into the innermost parts בָֽטֶן׃ <S%H990><s%> of the belly

גַּ֭ם <S%H1571><s%> also מִתְרַפֶּ֣ה <S%H7503><s%> He also that is slothful בִמְלַאכְתּ֑וֹ <S%H4399><s%> in his work אָ֥ח <S%H251><s%> is brother ה֝֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לְבַ֣עַל <S%H1167><s%> to him that is a great מַשְׁחִֽית׃ <S%H7843><s%> waster

מִגְדַּל־ <S%H4026><s%> tower עֹ֭ז <S%H5797><s%> [is] a strong שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> The name יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> God בּֽוֹ־ יָר֖וּץ <S%H7323><s%> runneth צַדִּ֣יק <S%H6662><s%> the righteous וְנִשְׂגָּֽב׃ <S%H7682><s%> into it and is safe

ה֣וֹן <S%H1952><s%> wealth עָ֭שִׁיר <S%H6223><s%> The rich man's קִרְיַ֣ת <S%H7151><s%> city עֻזּ֑וֹ <S%H5797><s%> [is] his strong וּכְחוֹמָ֥ה <S%H2346><s%> wall נִ֝שְׂגָּבָ֗ה <S%H7682><s%> and as an high בְּמַשְׂכִּיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4906><s%> in his own conceit

לִפְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> Before שֶׁ֭בֶר <S%H7667><s%> destruction יִגְבַּ֣הּ <S%H1361><s%> is haughty לֵב־ <S%H3820><s%> the heart אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of man וְלִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> and before כָב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> honour עֲנָוָֽה׃ <S%H6038><s%> [is] humility

מֵשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> He that answereth דָּ֭בָר <S%H1697><s%> a matter בְּטֶ֣רֶם <S%H2962><s%> before יִשְׁמָ֑ע <S%H8085><s%> before he heareth אִוֶּ֥לֶת <S%H200><s%> [it] it [is] folly הִיא־ <S%H1931><s%> he ל֝֗וֹ וּכְלִמָּֽה׃ <S%H3639><s%> and shame

רֽוּחַ־ <S%H7307><s%> The spirit אִ֭ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of a man יְכַלְכֵּ֣ל <S%H3557><s%> will sustain מַחֲלֵ֑הוּ <S%H4245><s%> his infirmity וְר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> spirit נְ֝כֵאָ֗ה <S%H5218><s%> but a wounded מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> who יִשָּׂאֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H5375><s%> who can bear

לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> The heart נָ֭בוֹן <S%H995><s%> of the prudent יִקְנֶה־ <S%H7069><s%> getteth דָּ֑עַת <S%H1847><s%> knowledge וְאֹ֥זֶן <S%H241><s%> and the ear חֲ֝כָמִ֗ים <S%H2450><s%> of the wise תְּבַקֶּשׁ־ <S%H1245><s%> seeketh דָּֽעַת׃ <S%H1847><s%> knowledge

מַתָּ֣ן <S%H4976><s%> gift אָ֭דָם <S%H120><s%> A man's יַרְחִ֣יב <S%H7337><s%> maketh room ל֑וֹ וְלִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> him before גְדֹלִ֣ים <S%H1419><s%> great men יַנְחֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H5148><s%> for him and bringeth

צַדִּ֣יק <S%H6662><s%> [seemeth] just הָרִאשׁ֣וֹן <S%H7223><s%> [He that is] first בְּרִיב֑וֹ <S%H7379><s%> in his own cause [יָבֹא־ כ] (וּבָֽא־ <S%H935><s%> comes ק) <S%H935><s%> comes וַחֲקָרֽוֹ׃ <S%H2713><s%> and searcheth

מִ֭דְיָנִים <S%H4079><s%> causeth contentions יַשְׁבִּ֣ית <S%H7673><s%> to cease הַגּוֹרָ֑ל <S%H1486><s%> The lot וּבֵ֖ין <S%H996><s%> between עֲצוּמִ֣ים <S%H6099><s%> between the mighty יַפְרִֽיד׃ <S%H6504><s%> and parteth

אָ֗ח <S%H251><s%> A brother נִפְשָׁ֥ע <S%H6586><s%> offended מִקִּרְיַת־ <S%H7151><s%> city עֹ֑ז <S%H5797><s%> [is harder to be won] than a strong [וּמְדֹונִים כ] (וּ֝מִדְיָנִ֗ים <S%H4066><s%> brawling ק) כִּבְרִ֥יחַ <S%H1280><s%> [are] like the bars אַרְמֽוֹן׃ <S%H759><s%> of a castle

מִפְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> with the fruit פִי־ <S%H6310><s%> of his mouth אִ֭ישׁ <S%H376><s%> A man's תִּשְׂבַּ֣ע <S%H7646><s%> shall be satisfied בִּטְנ֑וֹ <S%H990><s%> belly תְּבוּאַ֖ת <S%H8393><s%> [and] with the increase שְׂפָתָ֣יו <S%H8193><s%> of his lips יִשְׂבָּֽע׃ <S%H7646><s%> shall he be filled

מָ֣וֶת <S%H4194><s%> Death וְ֭חַיִּים <S%H2416><s%> and life בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> [are] in the power לָשׁ֑וֹן <S%H3956><s%> of the tongue וְ֝אֹהֲבֶ֗יהָ <S%H157><s%> and they that love יֹאכַ֥ל <S%H398><s%> it shall eat פִּרְיָֽהּ׃ <S%H6529><s%> the fruit

מָצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> [Whoso] findeth אִ֭שָּׁה <S%H802><s%> a wife מָ֣צָא <S%H4672><s%> findeth ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> a good וַיָּ֥פֶק <S%H6329><s%> [thing] and obtaineth רָ֝צ֗וֹן <S%H7522><s%> favour מֵיְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

תַּחֲנוּנִ֥ים <S%H8469><s%> intreaties יְדַבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> useth רָ֑שׁ <S%H7326><s%> The poor וְ֝עָשִׁ֗יר <S%H6223><s%> but the rich יַעֲנֶ֥ה <S%H6030><s%> answereth עַזּֽוֹת׃ <S%H5794><s%> roughly

אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> A man רֵ֭עִים <S%H7453><s%> [that hath] friends לְהִתְרֹעֵ֑עַ <S%H7489><s%> must shew himself friendly וְיֵ֥שׁ <S%H3426><s%> and there is אֹ֝הֵ֗ב <S%H157><s%> a friend דָּבֵ֥ק <S%H1695><s%> [that] sticketh closer מֵאָֽח׃ <S%H251><s%> than a brother
